title: Tilt-Shift Diorama
description: Un style visuel distinctif qui simule l'effet de maquette grâce à des techniques de photographie à bascule et décentrement (tilt-shift) et une esthétique macro. Il transforme des sujets grandeur nature en modèles réduits ressemblant à des jouets en utilisant une très faible profondeur de champ, une saturation des couleurs élevée et une perspective isométrique en plongée.
description_en: A distinctive visual style that simulates miniature faking through the use of tilt-shift photography techniques and macro lens aesthetics. It transforms life-sized subjects into toy-like scale models using extreme shallow depth of field, high color saturation, and a specific high-angle isometric perspective.
description_fr: Un style visuel distinctif qui simule l'effet de maquette grâce à des techniques de photographie à bascule et décentrement (tilt-shift) et une esthétique macro. Il transforme des sujets grandeur nature en modèles réduits ressemblant à des jouets en utilisant une très faible profondeur de champ, une saturation des couleurs élevée et une perspective isométrique en plongée.
prompt: Photorealistic tilt-shift photography aesthetic rendering {{subject}} as a high-fidelity miniature scale model diorama. The image utilizes an extreme shallow depth of field consistent with macro photography (simulating an f/1.8 aperture on a large format sensor), creating a distinct horizontal plane of razor-sharp focus while the foreground and background dissolve into heavy, creamy Gaussian and bokeh blur. The {{subject}} appears constructed from high-quality model materials: matte-painted resin, structured thermoplastics, and hand-detailed textures that mimic real-world weathering but at a 1:87 scale. Lighting is configured as {{lighting}}, casting realistic, scale-appropriate shadows that emphasize the dimensional relief of the model, with specular highlights suggesting semi-gloss finishes on metallic, glass, or wet surfaces. The color palette is hyper-saturated and vibrant, reminiscent of toy packaging or architectural rendering, dominated by {{primary_color}} in the focal areas and {{accent_color}} providing striking contrast in the illuminated details, shifting towards cooler, muted tones in the blurred periphery. The composition mimics an isometric projection typical of architectural modeling, looking down from a high angle to reinforce the 'God's eye view' of a tiny world. Material textures are tactile but smoothed, lacking the gritty noise of full-scale reality, replacing it with the sheen of painted plastic or die-cast metal. The atmosphere conveys a mood of {{mood}}, utilizing color grading that enhances the warmth of lights and the cool depth of shadows. background_prompt: A completely out-of-focus background environment representing a distant cityscape or landscape, rendered in the style of a macro photography backdrop or diorama matte painting. The scene is an abstract wash of heavy bokeh circles (circles of confusion) and diffused light shapes, utilizing {{primary_color}} and {{accent_color}} to suggest distant lights, traffic, or structures without any sharp definition. The texture is smooth and soft, mimicking the look of a distant painted backdrop in a model set or the extreme defocus of a fast tilt-shift lens. The lighting suggests a {{lighting}} ambience, creating a mood of {{mood}} through color temperature gradients, completely devoid of foreground subjects or sharp focal points. The scene creates a sense of depth through graduated blur, appearing furthest away at the top of the frame.
